predicate.note: Frames file for 'clank' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 43.2, Framenet entry Sound emission.

example.name: poor John
example.text: The chains wrapped around John clanked dully in the dark.

example.name: the one example
example.text: Marshall came [*-1] clanking in like Marley's ghost dragging those chains of brigades and air wings and links with Arab despots.
example.arg: like Marley's ghost dragging those chains of brigades and air wings and links with Arab despots
